abilities.name: Lightning Manipulation
abilities.description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into lightning, making them a Lightning Human.

abilities.name: Electrical Discharge
abilities.description: Can discharge powerful electrical attacks that can incapacitate or kill opponents.

abilities.name: Intangibility
abilities.description: As a Logia type, the user can become intangible by transforming into lightning, allowing attacks to pass through them.

weaknesses.description: Rubber is a natural insulator and is immune to electricity, making rubber-based fighters natural counters.

keyMoments.description: Enel uses his Mantra ability (enhanced by his Devil Fruit powers) to predict the survival game's outcome.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates how Enel combines his Devil Fruit with other abilities to maintain god-like control over Skypiea.
